Sentencas: The influence of the fuel composition and fuel utilisation on the performance of an anode-supported solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) have been studied as function of time by DC-methods both on single cells and on short stacks.
Titulo: Operation of anode-supported thin electrolyte film solid oxide fuel cells at 800°C and below

Sentencas: For a single cell the influence of the water/hydrogen ratio in the fuel can mainly be attributed to the change in the open cell voltage.
Titulo: Operation of anode-supported thin electrolyte film solid oxide fuel cells at 800°C and below

Sentencas: The performance of single cell fed with a mixture of methane and water (1:2) (internal reforming) is in the current density range up to 0.3 A/cm(2) comparable to the performance of the cell under hydrogen/water (2:1) having the same open cell voltage.
Titulo: Operation of anode-supported thin electrolyte film solid oxide fuel cells at 800°C and below

Sentencas: The influence of the water content in the hydrogen an the performance of a short stack is also mainly caused by the difference in open cell voltage.
Titulo: Operation of anode-supported thin electrolyte film solid oxide fuel cells at 800°C and below

Sentencas: The influence of a prolonged galvanostatic load on the performance of a short stack was measured.
Titulo: Operation of anode-supported thin electrolyte film solid oxide fuel cells at 800°C and below
